name: Simpler Google: Brandless
description:
Many visual elements have been removed, and colours changed - resulting in a much more minimal look for the Google search engine. 

This provides the same functionality as the original style (style 96376) but removes logos and the 'apps' button.
additional_info:
21/1/2014:-
~Bug fix: see changelog for 'Simpler Google'

15/1/2014:-
~Initial release
   - Code based upon original style: see changelog from same day for more details
